title: Solutions
description: This is an alternate cover edition for B008K3ILLY Charlie has a problem—he’s trying to be like his father Chuck, a sexist cheat.Charlie’s father has a problem—he can’t wait to dump the kid so he can take off with his new honey.Charlie’s mother, Carol, has a problem—her husband Chuck.Charlie’s grandmother, Gram, has a problem—Chuck has dumped Charlie on her farm for the summer.But there may be solutions to all of their problems, in the form of herbal solutions made by a friend of Gram’s. Solutions that might make Charlie more agreeable, might take the edge off his rough macho exterior …and might reveal a feminine interior …
author: Karin Bishop
